languages.text: "Какая проницательность, {name}. Я помогу тебе со следующей догадкой: ты мне нуж{mf|ен|на} ради твоей крови. У тебя есть возможность поделиться ей добровольно — или я сам изолью ее из тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Какая проницательность, {name}. Я помогу тебе со следующей догадкой: ты мне нуж{mf|ен|на} ради твоей крови. У тебя есть возможность поделиться ей добровольно — или я сам изолью ее из тебя".

languages.text: "How perceptive of you, {name}. I'll help you with the next insight: I need you here for your blood. You have the option to share it voluntarily — or I will squeeze it out of you myself."
languages.original_text: "Какая проницательность, {name}. Я помогу тебе со следующей догадкой: ты мне нуж{mf|ен|на} ради твоей крови. У тебя есть возможность поделиться ей добровольно — или я сам изолью ее из тебя".

traits.locale_text: "How perceptive of you, {name}. I shouldn't be surprised — after all, yours is the blood of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, the glorious House von Valancius!"
"How perceptive of you, {name}. I shouldn't be surprised — after all, yours is the blood of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, the glorious House von Valancius!"
"How perceptive of you, {name}. I'll help you with the next insight: I need you here for your blood. You have the option to share it voluntarily — or I will pour it out of you myself."
"How perceptive of you, {name}. I'll help you with the next insight: I need you here for your blood. You have the option to share it voluntarily — or I will squeeze it out of you myself."
"How perceptive of you, {name}. I'll help you with the next insight: I need you here for your blood. You have the option to share it voluntarily — or I will squeeze it out of you myself."
"How perceptive of you, {name}. I'll help you with the next insight: I need you here for your blood. You have the option to share it voluntarily — or I will squeeze it out of you myself."

languages.text: “你的观察力真是敏锐，{name}。我可以告诉你，接下来会发生什么事情——我需要你的鲜血。你可以选择自愿把它献出来，或者，我也可以亲自从你身上抽出来。”
languages.original_text: "How perceptive of you, {name}. I'll help you with the next insight: I need you here for your blood. You have the option to share it voluntarily — or I will squeeze it out of you myself."

traits.locale_text: “你的观察力真是敏锐，{name}。我可以告诉你，接下来会发生什么事情——我需要你的鲜血。你可以选择自愿把它献出来，或者，我也可以亲自从你身上抽出来。”

languages.text: «Muy perceptiv{mf|o|a}, {name}. L{mf|e|a} ayudaré con el próximo misterio: está aquí porque necesito su sangre. Puede compartirla voluntariamente o puedo extraerla yo mismo».
languages.original_text: "How perceptive of you, {name}. I'll help you with the next insight: I need you here for your blood. You have the option to share it voluntarily — or I will squeeze it out of you myself."

traits.locale_text: «Muy perceptiv{mf|o|a}, {name}. L{mf|e|a} ayudaré con el próximo misterio: está aquí porque necesito su sangre. Puede compartirla voluntariamente o puedo extraerla yo mismo».

languages.text: 「お前は鋭いな、{name}。次の問答の答えを助けてやろう。お前から必要なのは血だけだ。あるのは2つの選択肢だ。自発的に提供するか、さもなくば、私が手ずから君から搾り取るかのどちらかだ」
languages.original_text: "How perceptive of you, {name}. I'll help you with the next insight: I need you here for your blood. You have the option to share it voluntarily — or I will squeeze it out of you myself."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は鋭いな、{name}。次の問答の答えを助けてやろう。私はお前の血のためだけにお前が必要なんだ。君にあるのは2つの選択肢だ。自発的に提供するか、さもなくば、私が手ずから君から搾り取るかのどちらかだ」
「お前は鋭いな、{name}。次の問答の答えを助けてやろう。お前から必要なのは血だけだ。あるのは2つの選択肢だ。自発的に提供するか、さもなくば、私が手ずから君から搾り取るかのどちらかだ」

languages.text: « Quelle perspicacité, {name}. Laissez-moi ruiner votre prochaine révélation : j'ai besoin de votre sang. Libre à vous de me le donner volontairement... dans le cas contraire, je me verrai dans l'obligation de vous le soutirer moi-même. »
languages.original_text: "How perceptive of you, {name}. I'll help you with the next insight: I need you here for your blood. You have the option to share it voluntarily — or I will squeeze it out of you myself."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle perspicacité, {name}. Laissez-moi ruiner votre prochaine révélation : j'ai besoin de votre sang. Libre à vous de me le donner volontairement... dans le cas contraire, je me verrai dans l'obligation de vous le soutirer moi-même. »

languages.text: "Eure Auffassungsgabe ist immens, {name}. Bei der nächsten Einsicht will ich Euch behilflich sein. Ich brauche Euch hier wegen Eures Bluts. Ihr könnt es freiwillig spenden – oder ich quetsche es eigenhändig aus Euch heraus."
languages.original_text: "How perceptive of you, {name}. I'll help you with the next insight: I need you here for your blood. You have the option to share it voluntarily — or I will squeeze it out of you myself."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Auffassungsgabe ist immens, {name}. Bei der nächsten Einsicht will ich Euch behilflich sein. Ich brauche Euch hier wegen Eures Bluts. Ihr könnt es freiwillig spenden – oder ich quetsche es eigenhändig aus Euch heraus."

languages.original_text: "How perceptive of you, {name}. I'll help you with the next insight: I need you here for your blood. You have the option to share it voluntarily — or I will squeeze it out of you myself."

languages.text: "Hemen de kavrayıverdin {name}. Seni daha fazla tahmin yürütme zahmetinden kurtarayım: Bana kanın gerek. Paşa paşa verme seçeneğin mevcut. İtiraz edersen de zorla alacağız artık."
languages.original_text: "How perceptive of you, {name}. I'll help you with the next insight: I need you here for your blood. You have the option to share it voluntarily — or I will squeeze it out of you myself."

traits.locale_text: "Hemen de kavrayıverdin {name}. Seni daha fazla tahmin yürütme zahmetinden kurtarayım: Bana kanın gerek. Paşa paşa verme seçeneğin mevcut. İtiraz edersen de zorla alacağız artık."
